price: 77. As-tu considéré celui-là qui n’a pas cru en Nos versets et a dit : « Il me sera certes donné des biens et des enfants » ?
arabic: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالٗا وَوَلَدًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: afara-ayta alladhī kafara biāyātinā waqāla laūtayanna mālan wawaladan
